title: is NA server down?
body: i cant log in to NA server is it down?

replies.body: The servers are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them.

Around the time you posted this, there were some service issues that were causing login failures. They were resolved shortly after they started, so please let me know if you're still having issues and we can work together on resolving them.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5WyzT7Ya,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-19T23:19:44.665+0000)
>
> Around the time you posted this, there were some service issues that were causing login failures. They were resolved shortly after they started, so please let me know if you're still having issues and we can work together on resolving them.

I'm actually unable to connect to the chat (or access my friends list). I can do everything else just fine, and I think I'm connected, but as for my friend list and chat, I just can't connect. Help?

http://prntscr.com/ck0lab
(Showing match hist to show that I am connected to the server)

> [{quoted}](name=BlackTecno,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5WyzT7Ya,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-19T23:23:30.980+0000)
>
> I'm actually unable to connect to the chat (or access my friends list). I can do everything else just fine, and I think I'm connected, but as for my friend list and chat, I just can't connect. Help?
> 
> http://prntscr.com/ck0lab
> (Showing match hist to show that I am connected to the server)

And .2 seconds after I posted this, no issue at all, man you guys work fast.

http://prntscr.com/ck0lrn
they farted for about two minutes and was ok again. but now i cant close the game....
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5WyzT7Ya,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-18T05:40:35.331+0000)
>
> LoL NA is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.

OMG are you secretly Dash?
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
